original_text: 来自Twitter的KDD 2014论文: Large-Scale High-Precision Topic Modeling on Twitter http://t.cn/RPgclet 号称有93% precision。不过确实感觉是非常实际的工业界主题模型解决方案。
text: 来自Twitter的KDD 2014论文: Large-Scale High-Precision Topic Modeling on Twitter http://t.cn/RPgclet 号称有93% precision。不过确实感觉是非常实际的工业界主题模型解决方案。

children.text: When the tweet length is close to zero, they got the best precision that is close to 90%. My guess is that these tweets only contain the keywords they used to collect them. That is why they contain the pure info about a topic, without much noise.
